languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, мы приближаемся к Оазис V. В старых летописях планета значится процветающим агромиром, однако долгие столетия на ней бушевала война. В итоге неизвестный катаклизм поразил биосферу и превратил планету в один огромный шторм, уничтоживший все живое. Однако... мы уловили слабый сигнал, исходящий из недр мира. Возможно, под землей еще остались выжившие".

traits.locale_text: Лорд-капитан, мы приближаемся к Оазис V. В старых летописях планета значится процветающим агромиром, однако долгие столетия на ней бушевала война. В итоге неизвестный катаклизм поразил биосферу и превратил планету в один огромный шторм, уничтоживший все живое. Однако... мы уловили слабый сигнал, исходящий из недр мира. Возможно, под землей еще остались выжившие.

languages.text: "Lord Captain, we are approaching Oasis V. In old chronicles, the planet is referred to as a flourishing agri-world, though war raged there for many centuries. As a result of some unknown cataclysm, the biosphere failed and the planet turned into one massive storm that destroyed all life. However... we have picked up a weak signal coming from the depths of the world. There may be survivors underground."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, мы приближаемся к Оазис V. В старых летописях планета значится процветающим агромиром, однако долгие столетия на ней бушевала война. В итоге неизвестный катаклизм поразил биосферу и превратил планету в один огромный шторм, уничтоживший все живое. Однако... мы уловили слабый сигнал, исходящий из недр мира. Возможно, под землей еще остались выжившие".

As a result of some unknown cataclysm, the biosphere failed and the planet turned into one massive storm that destroyed all life. However... we have picked up a weak signal coming from the depths of the world. There may be survivors underground."

As a result of some unknown cataclysm, the biosphere failed and the planet turned into one massive storm that destroyed all life. However... we have picked up a weak signal coming from the depths of the world. There may be survivors underground."

As a result of some unknown cataclysm, the biosphere failed and the planet turned into one massive storm that destroyed all life. However... we have picked up a weak signal coming from the depths of the world. There may be survivors underground."

"Lord Captain, we are approaching Oasis V. In old chronicles, the planet is referred to as a flourishing agri-world, though war raged there for many centuries. As a result of some unknown cataclysm, the biosphere failed and the planet turned into one massive storm that destroyed all life. However... we have picked up a weak signal coming from the depths of the world. There may be survivors underground."

languages.text: “舰长大人，我们正在接近绿洲五号星。根据古老历史记载，尽管这颗行星曾长年累月地遭受战争摧残，但依然是个繁荣的农业世界。后来，发生了某种未知灾难，生物圈崩溃了。行星本身变成了一场巨大的风暴，摧毁了所有生命。不过……我们收到了来自这个世界深处的微弱信号，地下可能还有幸存者。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we are approaching Oasis V. In old chronicles, the planet is referred to as a flourishing agri-world, though war raged there for many centuries. As a result of some unknown cataclysm, the biosphere failed and the planet turned into one massive storm that destroyed all life. However... we have picked up a weak signal coming from the depths of the world. There may be survivors underground."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我们正在接近绿洲五号星。根据古老历史记载，尽管这颗行星曾长年累月地遭受战争摧残，但依然是个繁荣的农业世界。后来，发生了某种未知灾难，生物圈崩溃了。行星本身变成了一场巨大的风暴，摧毁了所有生命。不过……我们收到了来自这个世界深处的微弱信号，地下可能还有幸存者。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, nos acercamos a Oasis V. Según las crónicas antiguas, era un mundo agrícola floreciente, a pesar de sufrir una guerra que duró siglos. Un cataclismo del que no sabemos nada ocasionó un fallo total de la biosfera, desatando una tormenta que no dejó a nadie con vida. Sin embargo... hemos detectado una señal débil que proviene de las profundidades del planeta. Podría haber sobrevivido alguien bajo tierra».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we are approaching Oasis V. In old chronicles, the planet is referred to as a flourishing agri-world, though war raged there for many centuries. As a result of some unknown cataclysm, the biosphere failed and the planet turned into one massive storm that destroyed all life. However... we have picked up a weak signal coming from the depths of the world. There may be survivors underground."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, nos acercamos a Oasis V. Según las crónicas antiguas, era un mundo agrícola floreciente, a pesar de sufrir una guerra que duró siglos. Un cataclismo del que no sabemos nada ocasionó un fallo total de la biosfera, desatando una tormenta que no dejó a nadie con vida. Sin embargo... hemos detectado una señal débil que proviene de las profundidades del planeta. Podría haber sobrevivido alguien bajo tierra».

languages.text: "Lord Captain, wir nähern uns Oasis V. In alten Chroniken wird der Planet als blühende Agrarwelt bezeichnet, obwohl dort viele Jahrhunderte lang Krieg herrschte. Infolge einer unbekannten Katastrophe versagte die Biosphäre und der Planet verwandelte sich in einen gewaltigen Sturm, der alles Leben vernichtete. Aber... wir haben ein schwaches Signal aus den Tiefen der Welt aufgefangen. Es könnte Überlebende unter der Erde geben."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we are approaching Oasis V. In old chronicles, the planet is referred to as a flourishing agri-world, though war raged there for many centuries. As a result of some unknown cataclysm, the biosphere failed and the planet turned into one massive storm that destroyed all life. However... we have picked up a weak signal coming from the depths of the world. There may be survivors underground."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, we are approaching Oasis V. In old chronicles, the planet is referred to as a flourishing agri-world, though war raged there for many centuries. As a result of some unknown cataclysm, the biosphere failed and the planet turned into one massive storm that destroyed all life. However... we have picked up a weak signal coming from the depths of the world. There may be survivors underground."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous approchons d'Oasis V. Cette planète est décrite dans les anciennes chroniques comme un agri-monde florissant. Hélas la guerre y a ensuite fait rage pendant de nombreux siècles. Suite à un mystérieux cataclysme, la biosphère s'est effondrée, et une tempête planétaire a détruit toute vie à sa surface. Pourtant... nous captons un faible signal en provenance des tréfonds de ce monde. Il se peut que des survivants se terrent sous la surface. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we are approaching Oasis V. In old chronicles, the planet is referred to as a flourishing agri-world, though war raged there for many centuries. As a result of some unknown cataclysm, the biosphere failed and the planet turned into one massive storm that destroyed all life. However... we have picked up a weak signal coming from the depths of the world. There may be survivors underground."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous approchons d'Oasis V. Cette planète est décrite dans les anciennes chroniques comme un agri-monde florissant. Hélas la guerre y a ensuite fait rage pendant de nombreux siècles. Suite à un mystérieux cataclysme, la biosphère s'est effondrée, et une tempête planétaire a détruit toute vie à sa surface. Pourtant... nous captons un faible signal en provenance des tréfonds de ce monde. Il se peut que des survivants se terrent sous la surface. »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、我々はオアシス・Vに近づいています。古い年代記に栄えた農業惑星だと記されていますが、ここでは何世紀にもわたって激しい戦争が起こっていました。説明のつかない大変動が何度か起こった結果、生物圏がうまく働かなくなり、惑星はまるごと巨大な嵐に変わって、すべての命が破壊されたのです。ですが…惑星の深部から微弱な信号を受信しました。地下に生存者がいるのかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we are approaching Oasis V. In old chronicles, the planet is referred to as a flourishing agri-world, though war raged there for many centuries. As a result of some unknown cataclysm, the biosphere failed and the planet turned into one massive storm that destroyed all life. However... we have picked up a weak signal coming from the depths of the world. There may be survivors underground."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、我々はオアシス・Vに近づいています。古い年代記に栄えた農業惑星だと記されていますが、ここでは何世紀にもわたって激しい戦争が起こっていました。説明のつかない大変動が何度か起こった結果、生物圏がうまく働かなくなり、惑星はまるごと巨大な嵐に変わって、すべての命が破壊されたのです。ですが…惑星の深部から微弱な信号を受信しました。地下に生存者がいるのかもしれません」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Vaha V'e yaklaşıyoruz. Eski vakayinamelerde canlı bir zirai dünya olarak geçiyor ancak gezegende yüzyıllar süren bir savaş başlamış. Bilinmeyen bir felaketin bir sonucu olarak biyosfer çökmüş ve gezegen, tüm yaşamı yok eden dev bir fırtınaya dönüşmüş. Ancak... Dünyanın derinliklerinden gelen zayıf bir sinyal yakaladık. Yer altında hayatta kalanlar olabilir."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we are approaching Oasis V. In old chronicles, the planet is referred to as a flourishing agri-world, though war raged there for many centuries. As a result of some unknown cataclysm, the biosphere failed and the planet turned into one massive storm that destroyed all life. However... we have picked up a weak signal coming from the depths of the world. There may be survivors underground."
